rewrite.original_match: ^エリアの最重要依頼 《(.+)》 が発生$
^封鎖エリア《ハイデル地下霊廟 深部～最深部》開放$
^封鎖エリアが開放《<SPOT (\d+)>》 封鎖エリアが開放《<SPOT (\d+)>》$
^新たな強敵が出現《<SPOT (\d+)>》 封鎖エリアが開放《<SPOT (\d+)>》$
rewrite.translation_replace: New powerful enemy at "<SPOT {0}>" Unblock area "<SPOT {1}>"

rewrite.original_match: ^封鎖交通路が復旧《<SPOT (\d+)>へ続く大門・崖崩れ》 新たな強敵が出現《<SPOT (\d+)>》$
rewrite.translation_replace: Restore path "gate to <SPOT {0}> blocked by cliff collapse" New powerful enemy at "<SPOT {1}>"

rewrite.original_match: ^支援品の配給 封鎖エリアが開放《<SPOT (\d+)>》$
rewrite.translation_replace: Distribution of support goods Unblock area "<SPOT {0}>"

rewrite.original_match: ^支援品のランクアップ 封鎖エリアが開放《<SPOT (\d+)>》$
rewrite.translation_replace: Rank up of support goods Unblock area "<SPOT {0}>"

rewrite.original_match: ^各地の解放軍より救援依頼が発生 封鎖エリアが開放《<SPOT (\d+)>》$
rewrite.translation_replace: Rescue requests available from the liberation army in various places Unblock area "<SPOT {0}>"

rewrite.original_match: ^魔物集結スポットが出現《<SPOT (\d+)>》 《(.+)》奪還時にエリアマスターが移動$
rewrite.translation_replace: Monster Gathering Spot "<SPOT {0}>" appears When "{1}" is recaptured, area master joins

rewrite.original_match: ^エリアマスターが《(.+)》に合流 王家より封印されている扉が解放$
rewrite.translation_replace: Area master joins "{0:@}" Unlock Royal Family sealed doors

rewrite.original_match: ^エリアマスターが《<SPOT (\d+)>》に合流 封鎖エリアが開放《<SPOT (\d+)>》$
^各地の解放軍より救援依頼が発生 王家より封印されている扉が解放$
rewrite.translation_replace: Rescue requests available from the liberation army in various places Unlock Royal Family sealed doors
